description:
Berserker of Red approaches the Black Faction stronghold. The Yggdmillennia clan and their Servants seize the opportunity to take action.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Der Preis ist das Leben, der Tod die Erlösung
Price of Life, Redemption of Death
Sei no Daishou, Shi no Tsugunai
生の代償, 死の償い
